wordcram
Class Sizers

java.lang.Object
  wordcram.Sizers

public class Sizers
extends java.lang.Object

Sizers contains pre-made WordSizer implementations that you might find useful. Right now, it's only byWeight(int, int) and byRank(int, int).

See Also:
WordSizer

Constructor Summary
Sizers()
           
 
Method Summary
static WordSizer byRank(int minSize, int maxSize)
          Returns a WordSizer that sizes words by their rank.
static WordSizer byWeight(int minSize, int maxSize)
          Returns a WordSizer that sizes words by their weight, where the "heaviest" word will be sized at maxSize.

Constructor Detail

Sizers

public Sizers()
Method Detail

byWeight

public static WordSizer byWeight(int minSize,
                                 int maxSize)
Returns a WordSizer that sizes words by their weight, where the "heaviest" word will be sized at maxSize.

To be specific, the font size for each word will be calculated with: 

 PApplet.lerp(minSize, maxSize, (float) word.weight)

Parameters:
minSize - the size to draw a Word with weight = 0
maxSize - the size to draw a Word with weight = 1
Returns:
the WordSizer

byRank

public static WordSizer byRank(int minSize,
                               int maxSize)
Returns a WordSizer that sizes words by their rank. The first word will be sized at maxSize.

To be specific, the font size for each word will be calculated with: 

 PApplet.map(wordRank, 0, wordCount, maxSize, minSize)

Parameters:
minSize - the size to draw the last Word
maxSize - the size to draw the first Word
Returns:
the WordSizer
